title: Business Analyst
description:
Role: Developer - Business Analyst

Experience: 5+ years

Location: Hyderabad ( Work from office)

Job Type: Full Time Permanent position

Notice Period : Immediate joiners or max 15 days

Requirements


Analytical skills, problem-solving skills, Strong communication and domain knowledge.
Sound Knowledge in HTML,CSS, Microsoft. Net framework, Javascript, PHP, React and SQL.
Able to create detail business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for the business.
Experience in Agile scrum methodologies creating user stories and estimating story points for each stories.
Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills.
Working experience with any wireframe tools (Sketch ,Adobe, UXPin, Mockplus, JustInMind etc)
Ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.
Masters/Degree with a background in business, Engineering and IT with minimum 5 years working experience as business Analyst.


Responsibilities


Help the product owner groom the product backlog by considering purpose, prioritizing the stories,
organizing the stories, splitting epics into user stories, and ensuring a complete description of the
solution.
Studies the software application domain, prepares software requirements, and specification
(Software Requirements Specification) documents.
Works with the stakeholders to analyze and document business processes for the system to be
developed
Perform actual analysis on requirements to consider all scenarios/exceptions that may occur
Determine functional requirements and features and prepare a wireframe for user interface screen
Advise the product owner and coach the team, as well as other business analysis considerations
Communicates with both the developers and stakeholders in such a manner until the project ends.
Co-facilitate trainings/workshops client-side.


Skills:- Business Analysis
